Performance:
February 1983: The Ancient Calendar

Production: February 1983

Play: The Ancient Calendar (大経師昔暦)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Almanac Maker's (大経師内 / Daikyōji uchi)

Bairyu's House at Okazaki (岡崎村梅龍内 / Okazakimura Bairyū uchi)

The Hideout in Tamba Province (奥丹波隠れ家 / Okutamba kakurega)

Characters:

Osan (Nyōbō Osan / 女房おさん)

Ishun (Daikyōji Ishun / 大経師以春)

Sukeyemon (Tedai Sukeemon / 手代助右衛門)

Tama (Gejo Tama / 下女玉)

Osan's mother (Osan haha / おさん母)

Mohei (Tedai Mohei / 手代茂兵衛)

Shichisuke, a servant (Genan Shichisuke / 下男七介)

Denkichi, a servant (Genan Denkichi / 下男伝吉)

Bairyu (Akamatsu Bairyū / 赤松梅龍)

Dojun (Gifuya Dōjun / 岐阜屋道順)

Street entertainer (Manzai / 万歳)

Government official (Yakunin / 役人)

Policemen (Torite / 捕手)
